android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (fm.player.ui.MainActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. playstore_details.title: Podcast App: Free & Offline Podcasts by Player FM
playstore_details.description:
Player FM is the podcast player that refuses to compromise! No wifi? No problem! Download podcasts with Player FM and listen offline with no display ads.

Enjoy a distraction-free audio+video podcast experience that is elegant, powerful, and has your back! Sync play position across devices, customize themes, and manage playlists! Auto volume boost and silence skip on podcasts & your MP3 files.

What podcasts will you find here? Education (TED Talks), Productivity (Tim Ferriss), Chat (Oprah podcast), Comedy (Joe Rogan podcast), Audio drama and Audio Books (Night Vale), Stories (Serial). Dive into 20+ million free episodes from indie audio to major networks like NPR & MSNBC!

Play podcasts when it suits you!
📱 Best podcast app for your phone
🚗 Android Auto 🔊 Chromecast ⌚ WearOS 🌐 Web

"Top 30 Best Android apps of 2017" - TheNextWeb

★★★★★ KEY FEATURES ★★★★★

🆓 Free forever – no ads (really!) Subscribe, download, and play podcasts to your heart's content. A fabulous ad-free podcast app at no cost. Wait, but why?! Because our mission is to make podcasts fun and accessible to everyone, and that means YOU! Our business is selling *optional* premium plans and there are *no* third-party ads, popups, animations here … just an app that makes podcasting pure joy.

📱💻 Seamless cloud sync Follow a podcast on one device and it will appear on another. ✔ Google login ✔ Password login ✔  Web app

🚶 Podcast offline No wifi? No worries! Commuting or relaxing, your podcast app marches on.

😚 Colors & dark theme Prefer ocean-blue or midnight-black? Match your personality with custom themes.

💾 SD card Free your storage.

📦 Podcast groups Organize your shows into genres and moods.

⏲️  Sleep timer Let the podcast fall asleep when you do.

🚀 Auto volume boost Skip silence too!

⌚ Tech lover? Player FM integrates with many devices and platforms including Android Auto, Chromecast, WearOS, TeslaUnread, TalkBack, Samsung Gear S notifications, LG Quick Circle™, Music Boss, Podchaser, Drivemode, RockScout, Wearcasts, and more!

★★★★★ PREMIUM FEATURES ★★★★★

Podcast paradise for podcast purists!

😍 Play on several devices Sync playlists, full play history, and current episode.

😎 Playlists & bookmarks Organize with playlists and timestamped bookmarks tied to your cloud account.

😉 Compress audio Zip up your audio, while keeping it playable. A 100MB MP3 could compress to 30MB!

😃 Backup Your favorite episodes are automatically protected with full MP3 backup.

😋 Turbo Fetch Get updates early & often. Be the first to know!

😎 Personal search Locate any episode from your subscriptions and playlists.

Android Central: "Just looks amazing … packed with useful features … tell it what you're interested in and watch it work its magic"
Life Hacker: "Guides you to smart, interesting podcasts"
Tested: "Right from the start, I found the experience of using Player FM enjoyable"
All About Android: Winner, app arena
GigaOm: "Makes podcasts look cool again"

You'll love our human-powered podcast catalogue 😍. News podcasts (documentaries, liberal and conservative politics, current affairs - BBC, CNN, MSNBC, Fox, KCRW, NPR podcasts), education podcasts (TED Talks), comedy (Oprah, Conan, Joe Rogan podcast), sports (football, basketball, hockey, fitness podcasts), history (Dan Carlin), business (startups, trading, money podcasts - Freakonomics, Gary V), tech (Hardware, IT, Android & Google podcasts - Reply All), self-improvement (productivity, romance, learning - Tim Ferriss), story podcasts (audio drama, radio plays, true crime, mystery - Serial, Night Vale, Crimetown), culture (music, movies - Slate Gabfest), much more!

android@player.fm • twitter.com/playerfm • www.facebook.com/playerfm • blog.player.fm

Enjoy ✌✌✌
